CustomField.description: When an Event is created from an Opportunity, the associated brand is stamped onto the Event using a trigger. This field is purely for technical processing and not exposed on the UI.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When an Event is created from an Opportunity, the associated brand is stamped onto the Event using a trigger. This field is purely for technical processing and not exposed on the UI.
CustomField.label: Opportunity Brand
